verses.text: Ix yalanxi Jehová t'ayin icha tik:
Ach anima, ixic q'uelan t'a stojolal lum tzalquixtac yic Seir. Tzalan in lolonel t'a yib'anh lu'um.

Tzalan icha tik: Ha Jehová Yajal tz'alan icha tik: Ex cajan ex t'a tzalquixtac yic Seir, a in svala' to ay cot voval t'ayex, ol vak'och yaelal t'a eyib'anh, ol vak'kan tzinan e chonhab', ol mak'joccanem lanhnajoc.
Ha juntzanh e chonhab', ol in satel t'a junelnhej. Ol vak'kan tzinan. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi'
Yujto ayexnhejoch ajk'olal t'a chonhab' Israel, e milnaccham eb' ayic ayoch syaelal eb' yuj smul.
Yuj chi' a in Dios Yajal in svak' in ti' to ol ex vak'canoch t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, haxo chamel chi' ol ex pechan b'eyek'oc, ol ex cham yuj.
Ol vak'kan tzinan lum tzalquixtac Seir chi', manhxo ol in cha ek' anima ta'.
Ol vak'kan b'ud'joc el lum tzalquixtac, lum ch'olquixtac yet' yoltac ha ha' yuj snivanil eb' chamnac, aton eb' ol cham t'a oval.
Junelnhej ol vak'kan tzinan lum e lu'um chi', manhxalaj mach olto cajnajcan t'a e chonhab' chi'. Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi'.
Ha ex tik eyojtac to a in Jehová in ayinek' yet' eb' israel tik, palta tzeyalan icha tik: Ha smacb'en Israel yet' Judá, quic ol ajcanoc, xe comon chiej.

Palta a in Dios Yajal in svak' in ti' to icha val yoval e k'ool yet' e chichonk'olal ayoch t'a Israel tik, icha pax chi' ol ex vutej. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel yuj eb' israel to a in svak'och eyaelal yuj tas ix eyutej eb'.

Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in Jehová in ix vab' val e b'uchval lolonel ayic ix eyalan icha tik: Ha lum tzalquixtac t'a yol smacb'en Israel, ix kan val tzinan lu'um. Co maquec quiquej lu'um, xe chi.
Ix eyik' val chaanh e b'a t'ayin, ix in e b'uchani, palta ix vab'nhej tas ix eyal chi'.
Ha in Dios Yajal in swal juntzanh tik: Masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik ol tzalajq'ueoc ayic ol ex in satanel chi'.

Yujto a ex tik, ix ex te tzalaji ayic ix lajviel chonhab' Israel, yuj chi' ol in pactzitej t'ayex icha ix eyutej e b'a chi'. Ol vak'kan tzinan lum tzalquixtac Seir chi', aton e macb'en ex yinhtilalcan Edom. Icha chi' ol aj eyojtacaneli to a in ton Jehová in svutej icha chi', xchi Jehová, xa chi t'a eb', xchi t'ayin.
